1.title: Argentinosaurus and Eggshell
1.plot: Andy embarks on another exciting prehistoric adventure, travelling back 95 million years in search of an eggshell belonging to one of the biggest animals to ever walk the Earth.

2.title: Woolly Mammoth and Tusk
2.plot: When disaster strikes at the National museum, Andy sets off on a prehistoric adventure. Arriving 30,000 years in the past, Andy joins a herd of woolly mammoths and bumps into one of his own ancient ancestors.

3.title: Epidexipteryx and Tail Feather
3.plot: Andy heads 160 million years into the past in search of a feather belonging to a tiny prehistoric dinosaur called epidexipteryx; but an encounter with a hungry meat-eating dinosaur leaves Andy stranded in the tree-tops.

4.title: Nothrotheriops and Dung
4.plot: Andy travels 15,000 years into the past to meet a giant prehistoric sloth. On the way he is stalked by a sabre-toothed cat and rides a colossal Columbian mammoth.

5.title: Ophthalmosaurus and Painting
5.plot: Andy plunges into an underwater prehistoric adventure, 150 million years back in time, in search of a giant swimming reptile the size of an elephant; but after being chased by a scary shark he finds himself lost at sea.

6.title: Paraceratherium and Footprint
6.plot: Andy travels through time on another prehistoric adventure, this time landing 30 million years ago in Mongolia, where he meets the paraceratherium, a giant mammal; five times the size of a rhinoceros.

7.title: Spinosaurus and Scan
7.plot: Andy travels 100 million years back into prehistoric times to meet spinosaurus, a massive meat-eating dinosaur even bigger than a T-Rex. On his adventure he rides a speedy ouranosaurus and takes a dip in a prehistoric river.

8.title: Leptictidium and Fig
8.plot: Andy goes on another prehistoric adventure in search of the tiny leptictidium. a furry mammal that used to bounce around the forests of Europe fifty million years ago.

9.title: Woolly Rhino and Flowers
9.plot: Andy goes in search of the woolly rhino, travelling back 50,000 years to a snowy prehistoric mountain range; but can he find the rhino's favourite food and get back to his time-travelling clock before it returns to the museum.

10.title: Camptosaurus and Call
10.plot: Andy sets off on another time travelling adventure. Arriving 150 million years in the past he tracks down the peculiar camptosaurus and plays hide and seek with a fierce allosaurus.

11.title: Sabre-Toothed Cat and Roar
11.plot: Andy leaps into his time-traveling clock to visit the fearsome sabre-toothed cat, but when his gizmo malfunctions he is accidentally shrunk down to the size of an insect and must escape from a marauding prehistoric dung beetle.

12.title: Centrosaurus and Video
12.plot: Andy heads back in time to search a prehistoric forest for plant munching dinosaur, but he runs into a relative of T-Rex instead; then he joins a huge herd of centrosaurus to escape a flash flood.

13.title: Ankylosaur and Club
13.plot: Andy meets, Ankylosaur, the armoured tank of the dinosaur world when he travels back in time 70 million years. On his trip he must also contend with two fearsome predators, a giant relative of T-Rex and a sneaky pack of velociraptors.

14.title: Gigantoraptor and Feather
14.plot: Andy travels back 85 million years to meet a giant feathered dinosaur, as tall as a house. Along the way, he helps protect a nest full of prehistoric eggs and gets caught in super-sized sand storm.

15.title: Australopithecus and Hair
15.plot: Andy heads back 3 million years, where he runs into some ancient primates called Australopithecus and joins their tribe. Along the way he helps them fend off a prehistoric big cat and has his trusty backpack stolen by some hungry vultures.

16.title: Gastornis and Egg
16.plot: Andy heads 49 million years back in time, to find out what colour the eggs of a giant prehistoric bird were. But when a new chick starts to hatch and he must protect it against a colony of super-sized prehistoric ants.

17.title: Kimmerosaurus and Clamshell
17.plot: A lost earring sends Andy 160 million years into the past. Plunging into the waters of an ancient ocean, he meets some giant swimming reptiles and helps them to escape a colossal creature called 'Predator X'.

18.title: Chalicothere and Claw
18.plot: Andy travels back 30 million years to replace a valuable museum artifact. Landing in an age when giant mammals roamed the Earth he tracks down the peculiar chalicothere and gets chased by a swarm of angry prehistoric hornets.

19.title: Magyarosaurus and Reeds
19.plot: Andy travels back 70 million years to meet the miniature magyarosaurus, a relative of the giant sauropod dinosaurs. But he has to shrink down as well to hide from a giant flying reptile as tall as a giraffe.

20.title: Andrewsarchus and Tooth
20.plot: To finish a birthday surprise, Andy travels back 36 million years to find a tooth belonging to a giant carnivorous predator, but when his trusty backpack is stolen, he enlists the help of a herd of giant brontothere to get it back.

21.title: Woolly Mammoth and Ice
21.plot: Andy heads back 30,000 years, to the last ice age. On his travels he is stalked by a cave lion; joins some woolly mammoths on their annual migration and helps out one of the herd when they fall through a hole in the ice.

22.title: Paraceratherium and Skin
22.plot: Andy meets the largest mammal ever to walk the Earth when he travels back thirty million years. On his travels he has a night-time run in with some hungry hyenadons and helps a baby paraceratherium out of a sticky situation.

23.title: Basilosaurus and Barnacles
23.plot: Andy goes on another time-travelling adventure to a prehistoric ocean. During his journey he meets a troop of noisy primates, explores the seabed with his scuba gear and tracks down a giant prehistoric whale.

24.title: Australopithecus and Tool
24.plot: Andy travels back 3 million years to meet an ancient ancestor, Australopithecus. During his adventure he has a narrow escape from an angry relative of the elephant and takes a trip in an inflatable dinghy over a waterfall.

25.title: Gigantoraptor and Tumbleweed
25.plot: When the museum's prized prehistoric tumbleweed goes missing, Andy heads back 85 million years in time to try and find some more and helps a mother dinosaur protect her nest from predators.

locations: The London Natural History Museum, Cromwell Rd, London, England, UK
The Bottleyard, Whitchurch Lane, Bristol, England, UK
imdb.plot outline: Andy works at a museum and has the use of a time machine to go back to prehistoric times to collect feathers, bones, dung or whatever else is needed in prehistoric displays for his museum. With the help of his backpack's contents he manages to keep himself safe and return back to the museum with the items he finds.
imdb.title: Andy's Prehistoric Adventures
plot: Andy works at a museum and has the use of a time machine to go back to prehistoric times to collect feathers, bones, dung or whatever else is needed in prehistoric displays for his museum. With the help of the contents of his backpack he manages to keep himself safe and get back to the museum.

Andy works at a museum and has the use of a time machine to go back to prehistoric times to collect feathers, bones, dung or whatever else is needed in prehistoric displays for his museum. With the help of his backpack's contents he manages to keep himself safe and return back to the museum with the items he finds.
